text: E. Ahamed (29 April 1938 - 1 February 2017) was an Indian politician. He served as Minister of State for External Affairs in the Manmohan Singh government from 2004 through 2014. He represented the Malappuram Lok Sabha constituency of Kerala and is the National President of the Indian Union Muslim League (IUML) from 2009 until his death in 2017. He was born in Malappuram, Kerala. Ahamed died at the age of 78 at a hospital in Delhi, India after suffering from cardiac arrest during President Pranab Mukherjee's address to the parliament.Kerala MP E. Ahamed dies at RML after cardiac arrest in Parliament ==References== ==Other websites== * Members of Fourteenth Lok Sabha - Parliament of India website Category:1938 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Politicians from Kerala Category:Members of the Lok Sabha
title: E. Ahamed
